Episodes.Title: She Knows
Episodes.Plot: Oblivious of the fact that Trevor approached Jessica, Mike's on top of the world after Harvey entrusts him with closing a major lawsuit for the firm.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language,sexual references and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: David Costabile, Rebecca Schull, Tom Lipinski, Vanessa Ray

Episodes.Title: The Choice
Episodes.Plot: As Hardman makes it clear he's back to stay, Jessica tasks Harvey with helping shore up support for her within the firm - but Harvey's penchant for winning may create more enemies than friends.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language,sexual references and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael Cristofer, Ian Kahn, Nadia Dajani

Episodes.Title: Meet the New Boss
Episodes.Plot: Harvey bristles at Daniel's involvement on a lawsuit he's handling, but their battle to one up each other threatens the case, leaving Mike caught in the middle.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language,sexual references and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: David Costabile, Rebecca Schull, Rachael Harris, Margo Martindale

Episodes.Title: Discovery
Episodes.Plot: Louis and Mike finally see eye to eye, but Louis' paranoia may damage his budding friendship with Mike as well as his standing at the firm. Also, Travis Tanner rolls back into town, gunning for Harvey. Guest Stars: Eric Close, David Costabile, John Finn.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language,sexual references and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: David Costabile, John Finn, Erika Alexander, Eric Close

Episodes.Title: Break Point
Episodes.Plot: Harvey balks when Jessica puts him in the passenger seat on a lawsuit that could make or break the firm, and his backseat driving may have far-reaching consequences.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language,sexual references and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: David Costabile, Diane Neal, Julian Alcaraz, Patrick Garrow

Episodes.Title: All In
Episodes.Plot: Harvey's personal history with a client forces he and Mike to take on an unorthodox case from which they'd normally walk away. Also, Louis and Rachel team up to save a mutually beloved institution from ruin.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language,sexual references and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: Scott Grimes, Michael Des Barres, Matthew Glave, Erinn Hayes, Peter Outerbridge, Rachael Crawford

Episodes.Title: Sucker Punch
Episodes.Plot: As the fallout continues to reverberate from the pending lawsuit against Pearson Hardman, Harvey turns to a former colleague, with whom he has a thorny past, for help in proving the firm's case.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language,sexual references and drug use
Episodes.GuestStars: David Costabile, Jacinda Barrett, Eric Close

Episodes.Title: Rewind
Episodes.Plot: With the continuing upheaval at the firm, Mike and Harvey reflect back on how their past decisions have influenced their present situation.

Episodes.GuestStars: David Costabile, Gina Holden, Rebecca Schull, Tom Lipinski, Vanessa Ray, Jacinda Barrett

Episodes.Title: Asterisk
Episodes.Plot: Harvey's tasked with closing the one person whose vote will decide Pearson Hardman's future.

Episodes.Title: High Noon

Episodes.Title: Blind-Sided
Episodes.Plot: Harvey and Mike take on a criminal suit that hits close to home for Mike, who struggles to separate his personal feelings from the facts of the case.

Episodes.Title: Blood in the Water
Episodes.Plot: The war with Daniel may be over, but the battle has left Pearson Hardman vulnerable, and Harvey must protect the firm from a rival whose attack seems as personal as it is professional. Louis and Mike are forced to pay the price for previous actions.
Episodes.GuestStars: Diane Neal, Pooch Hall, Jon Foster

Episodes.Title: Zane vs. Zane
Episodes.Plot: Harvey goes head to head against Robert Zane, Rachel?s father, on a gender discrimination case that forces Rachel to confront her complicated relationship with her Dad.
Episodes.GuestStars: Amanda Schull, Lorry Ayers, Wendell Pierce

Episodes.Title: He's Back
Episodes.Plot: With the resources of the firm stretched to the limit, Daniel Hardman returns with an outrageous lawsuit against Jessica.

Episodes.Plot: Dana ?Scottie? Scott returns to complicate Harvey and Jessica's battle against Hardman. But this time, she's brought the full force of her British firm.
